name: innumerably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in such a great quantity that it cannot be counted: There are innumerably many stars and planets in the universe. This is a scene that can be acted in innumerably different ways.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lives of gangsters have been portrayed on film and television in innumerably many ways.As a teacher she possessed innumerably wonderful qualities.Before spelling was standardized, people could write words in innumerably different ways.I looked up at the innumerably starry skies.In his memoirs, he innumerably refers to his own talents, as well as to his impeccable honesty.
